verses.verse: בֶּן־ <WH1121> old שְׁתֵּ֨ים <WH8147> both עֶשְׂרֵ֤ה <WH6240> ten שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> years מְנַשֶּׁ֣ה <WH4519> Manasseh בְמָלְכ֔וֹ <WH4427> when he began to reign וַחֲמִשִּׁ֤ים <WH2572> fifty וְחָמֵשׁ֙ <WH2568> and five שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> and reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> name אִמּ֖וֹ <WH517> And his mother's חֶפְצִי־ בָֽהּ׃ <WH2657> [was] Hephzibah

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> And he did הָרַ֖ע <WH7451> [that which was] evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD כְּתֽוֹעֲבֹת֙ <WH8441> after the abominations הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> of the heathen אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> whom הוֹרִ֣ישׁ <WH3423> cast out יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> whom the LORD מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> before בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיָּ֗שָׁב <WH7725> again וַיִּ֙בֶן֙ <WH1129> For he built up אֶת־ <WH853> הַבָּמ֔וֹת <WH1116> the high places אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אִבַּ֖ד <WH6> had destroyed חִזְקִיָּ֣הוּ <WH2396> which Hezekiah אָבִ֑יו <WH1> his father וַיָּ֨קֶם <WH6965> and he reared up מִזְבְּחֹ֜ת <WH4196> altars לַבַּ֗עַל <WH1168> for Baal וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <WH6213> and made אֲשֵׁרָה֙ <WH842> a grove כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֗ה <WH6213> as did אַחְאָב֙ <WH256> Ahab מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיִּשְׁתַּ֙חוּ֙ <WH7812> and worshipped לְכָל־ <WH3605> all צְבָ֣א <WH6635> all the host הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> of heaven וַֽיַּעֲבֹ֖ד <WH5647> and served אֹתָֽם׃ <WH853>

וּבָנָ֥ה <WH1129> And he built מִזְבְּחֹ֖ת <WH4196> altars בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> in the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> of which אָמַ֣ר <WH559> said יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of which the LORD בִּירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> In Jerusalem אָשִׂ֥ים <WH7760> will I put אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמִֽי׃ <WH8034> my name

וַיִּ֥בֶן <WH1129> And he built מִזְבְּח֖וֹת <WH4196> altars לְכָל־ <WH3605> for all צְבָ֣א <WH6635> for all the host הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> of heaven בִּשְׁתֵּ֖י <WH8147> in the two חַצְר֥וֹת <WH2691> courts בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וְהֶעֱבִ֤יר <WH5674> pass אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנוֹ֙ <WH1121> And he made his son בָּאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> through the fire וְעוֹנֵ֣ן <WH6049> and observed times וְנִחֵ֔שׁ <WH5172> and used enchantments וְעָ֥שָׂה <WH6213> and dealt א֖וֹב <WH178> with familiar spirits וְיִדְּעֹנִ֑ים <WH3049> and wizards הִרְבָּ֗ה <WH7235> much לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> he wrought הָרַ֛ע <WH7451> wickedness בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD לְהַכְעִֽיס׃ <WH3707> to provoke [him] to anger

וַיָּ֕שֶׂם <WH7760> And he set אֶת־ <WH853> פֶּ֥סֶל <WH6459> a graven image הָאֲשֵׁרָ֖ה <WH842> of the grove אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> of which עָשָׂ֑ה <WH6213> that he had made בַּבַּ֗יִת <WH1004> in the house אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which אָמַ֤ר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of which the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> to David וְאֶל־ <WH413> about שְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <WH8010> and to Solomon בְנ֔וֹ <WH1121> his son בַּבַּ֨יִת <WH1004> In this house הַזֶּ֜ה <WH2088> this וּבִירוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <WH3389> and in Jerusalem אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which בָּחַ֙רְתִּי֙ <WH977> which I have chosen מִכֹּל֙ <WH3605> all שִׁבְטֵ֣י <WH7626> out of all tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אָשִׂ֥ים <WH7760> will I put אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמִ֖י <WH8034> my name לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> for ever

וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not אֹסִ֗יף <WH3254> any more לְהָנִיד֙ <WH5110> move רֶ֣גֶל <WH7272> Neither will I make the feet יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel מִן־ <WH4480> from הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> out of the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נָתַ֖תִּי <WH5414> which I gave לַֽאֲבוֹתָ֑ם <WH1> their fathers רַ֣ק ׀ <WH7535> but אִם־ <WH518> if יִשְׁמְר֣וּ <WH8104> only if they will observe לַעֲשׂ֗וֹת <WH6213> to do כְּכֹל֙ <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which צִוִּיתִ֔ים <WH6680> according to all that I have commanded וּלְכָל־ <WH3605> to all הַ֨תּוֹרָ֔ה <WH8451> them and according to all the law אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> עַבְדִּ֥י <WH5650> that my servant מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> Moses

וְלֹ֖א <WH3808> did not שָׁמֵ֑עוּ <WH8085> But they hearkened וַיַּתְעֵ֤ם <WH8582> seduced מְנַשֶּׁה֙ <WH4519> not and Manasseh לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> them to do אֶת־ <WH853> הָרָ֔ע <WH7451> more evil מִן־ <WH4480> more הַ֨גּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> than did the nations אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> whom הִשְׁמִ֣יד <WH8045> destroyed יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> whom the LORD מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> before בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel
וַיְדַבֵּ֧ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> And the LORD בְּיַד־ <WH3027> by עֲבָדָ֥יו <WH5650> his servants הַנְּבִיאִ֖ים <WH5030> the prophets לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

יַעַן֩ <WH3282> because אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who עָשָׂ֜ה <WH6213> hath done מְנַשֶּׁ֤ה <WH4519> Because Manasseh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> of Judah הַתֹּעֵב֣וֹת <WH8441> these abominations הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these הֵרַ֕ע <WH7489> [and] hath done wickedly מִכֹּ֛ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who עָשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> did הָאֱמֹרִ֖י <WH567> above all that the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who לְפָנָ֑יו <WH6440> which [were] before וַיַּחֲטִ֥א <WH2398> also to sin גַֽם־ <WH1571> also אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> him and hath made Judah בְּגִלּוּלָֽיו׃ <WH1544> with his idols פ

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> therefore כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֤ר <WH559> Therefore thus saith יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel הִנְנִי֙ <WH2005> behold מֵבִ֣יא <WH935> Behold I [am] bringing רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> [such] evil עַל־ <WH5921> on יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> upon Jerusalem וִֽיהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> and Judah אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> that כָּל־ <WH3605> whoever [שֹׁמְעָיו כ] (שֹׁ֣מְעָ֔הּ <WH8085> listen ק) תִּצַּ֖לְנָה <WH6750> shall tingle שְׁתֵּ֥י <WH8147> of it both אָזְנָֽיו׃ <WH241> his ears

וְנָטִ֣יתִי <WH5186> And I will stretch עַל־ <WH5921> over יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <WH3389> over Jerusalem אֵ֚ת <WH853> קָ֣ו <WH6957> the line שֹֽׁמְר֔וֹן <WH8111> of Samaria וְאֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁקֹ֖לֶת <WH4949> and the plummet בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house אַחְאָ֑ב <WH256> of Ahab וּמָחִ֨יתִי <WH4229> and I will wipe אֶת־ <WH853> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <WH3389> Jerusalem כַּֽאֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> one יִמְחֶ֤ה <WH4229> as [a man] wipeth אֶת־ <WH853> הַצַּלַּ֙חַת֙ <WH6747> a dish מָחָ֔ה <WH4229> wiping וְהָפַ֖ךְ <WH2015> [it] and turning עַל־ <WH5921> over פָּנֶֽיהָ׃ <WH6440> [it] upside down

וְנָטַשְׁתִּ֗י <WH5203> And I will forsake אֵ֚ת <WH853> שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <WH7611> the remnant נַחֲלָתִ֔י <WH5159> of mine inheritance וּנְתַתִּ֖ים <WH5414> and deliver בְּיַ֣ד <WH3027> them into the hand אֹֽיְבֵיהֶ֑ם <WH341> of their enemies וְהָי֥וּ <WH1961> will become לְבַ֛ז <WH957> and they shall become a prey וְלִמְשִׁסָּ֖ה <WH4933> and a spoil לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all אֹיְבֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH341> to all their enemies

יַ֗עַן <WH3282> because אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> they עָשׂ֤וּ <WH6213> Because they have done אֶת־ <WH853> הָרַע֙ <WH7451> [that which was] evil בְּעֵינַ֔י <WH5869> in my sight וַיִּהְי֥וּ <WH1961> been מַכְעִסִ֖ים <WH3707> me to anger אֹתִ֑י <WH853> מִן־ <WH4480> and have provoked הַיּ֗וֹם <WH3117> since the day אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after יָצְא֤וּ <WH3318> came forth אֲבוֹתָם֙ <WH1> their fathers מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> out of Egypt וְעַ֖ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> even unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this

וְגַם֩ <WH1571> Moreover דָּ֨ם <WH1818> blood נָקִ֜י <WH5355> innocent שָׁפַ֤ךְ <WH8210> shed מְנַשֶּׁה֙ <WH4519> Moreover Manasseh הַרְבֵּ֣ה <WH7235> much מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> very עַ֛ד <WH5704> with אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which מִלֵּ֥א <WH4390> till he had filled אֶת־ <WH853> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> Jerusalem פֶּ֣ה <WH6310> from one end לָפֶ֑ה <WH6310> to another לְבַ֤ד <WH905> alone מֵֽחַטָּאתוֹ֙ <WH2403> beside his sin אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הֶחֱטִ֣יא <WH2398> to sin אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> wherewith he made Judah לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> in doing הָרַ֖ע <WH7451> [that which was] evil בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וְיֶ֨תֶר <WH3499> Now the rest דִּבְרֵ֤י <WH1697> of the acts מְנַשֶּׁה֙ <WH4519> of Manasseh וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> and all that he did וְחַטָּאת֖וֹ <WH2403> and his sin אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which חָטָ֑א <WH2398> that he sinned הֲלֹא־ <WH3808> not הֵ֣ם <WH1992> like כְּתוּבִ֗ים <WH3789> [are] they not written עַל־ <WH5921> in סֵ֛פֶר <WH5612> in the book דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> of the acts הַיָּמִ֖ים <WH3117> age לְמַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> of the kings יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> Judah

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֤ב <WH7901> slept מְנַשֶּׁה֙ <WH4519> And Manasseh עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲבֹתָ֔יו <WH1> with his fathers וַיִּקָּבֵ֥ר <WH6912> and was buried בְּגַן־ <WH1588> in the garden בֵּית֖וֹ <WH1004> of his own house בְּגַן־ <WH1588> in the garden עֻזָּ֑א <WH5798> of Uzza וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <WH4427> reigned אָמ֥וֹן <WH526> and Amon בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <WH8478> his place פ

בֶּן־ <WH1121> old עֶשְׂרִ֨ים <WH6242> [was] twenty וּשְׁתַּ֤יִם <WH8147> and two שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> years אָמ֣וֹן <WH526> Amon בְּמָלְכ֔וֹ <WH4427> when he began to reign וּשְׁתַּ֣יִם <WH8147> two שָׁנִ֔ים <WH8141> years מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> name אִמּ֔וֹ <WH517> And his mother's מְשֻׁלֶּ֥מֶת <WH4922> [was] Meshullemeth בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter חָר֖וּץ <WH2743> of Haruz מִן־ <WH4480> at יָטְבָֽה׃ <WH3192> of Jotbah

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> And he did הָרַ֖ע <WH7451> [that which was] evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> did מְנַשֶּׁ֥ה <WH4519> Manasseh אָבִֽיו׃ <WH1> as his father

וַיֵּ֕לֶךְ <WH1980> walked in בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הַדֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> in all the way אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after הָלַ֣ךְ <WH1980> had walked אָבִ֑יו <WH1> that his father וַֽיַּעֲבֹ֗ד <WH5647> and served אֶת־ <WH853> הַגִּלֻּלִים֙ <WH1544> the idols אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after עָבַ֣ד <WH5647> served אָבִ֔יו <WH1> that his father וַיִּשְׁתַּ֖חוּ <WH7812> and worshipped לָהֶֽם׃

וַיַּעֲזֹ֕ב <WH5800> And he forsook אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God אֲבֹתָ֑יו <WH1> of his fathers וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and did not הָלַ֖ךְ <WH1980> and walked בְּדֶ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> not in the way יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַיִּקְשְׁר֥וּ <WH7194> conspired עַבְדֵֽי־ <WH5650> And the servants אָמ֖וֹן <WH526> of Amon עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> against וַיָּמִ֥יתוּ <WH4191> against him and slew אֶת־ <WH853> הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> the king בְּבֵיתֽוֹ׃ <WH1004> in his own house

וַיַּךְ֙ <WH5221> slew עַם־ <WH5971> And the people הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the land אֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַקֹּשְׁרִ֖ים <WH7194> all them that had conspired עַל־ <WH5921> against הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> against king אָמ֑וֹן <WH526> Amon וַיַּמְלִ֧יכוּ <WH4427> king עַם־ <WH5971> and the people הָאָ֛רֶץ <WH776> of the land אֶת־ <WH853> יֹאשִׁיָּ֥הוּ <WH2977> made Josiah בְנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <WH8478> his place

וְיֶ֛תֶר <WH3499> Now the rest דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> of the acts אָמ֖וֹן <WH526> of Amon אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֑ה <WH6213> which he did הֲלֹא־ <WH3808> not הֵ֣ם <WH1992> like כְּתוּבִ֗ים <WH3789> [are] they not written עַל־ <WH5921> in סֵ֛פֶר <WH5612> in the book דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> of the acts הַיָּמִ֖ים <WH3117> age לְמַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> of the kings יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> Judah

וַיִּקְבֹּ֥ר <WH6912> And he was buried אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> בִּקְבֻרָת֖וֹ <WH6900> in his sepulchre בְּגַן־ <WH1588> in the garden עֻזָּ֑א <WH5798> of Uzza וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <WH4427> reigned יֹאשִׁיָּ֥הוּ <WH2977> and Josiah בְנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <WH8478> his place פ
